name: Tara: The Hot Undead Mess - Waifu Game
name_original: Tara: The Hot Undead Mess - Waifu Game
description:
Based on the comic Tara: The Hot Undead Mess (tapas.io)

Ask the three very un-eligible bachelorettes a question - pick the one whose answer you like the most OR the one you dislike the least (Which is probably more likely)

And then, learn who your favourite( or more accurately least unfavourite) Tara: The Hot Undead Mess Waifu is!

And of course... You unlock up to 9 images, 3 for each characters ending!
